That makes things a little tricky, because we actually need the form fields ready and available in RecipeForm.jsx. They have to be passed into the ActionForm component as soon as it initializes. Dynamically adding and changing redux form fields is not really possible without completely destroying and re-initializing the form.
...that said, if I could get rid of the ActionForm component all together this would probably work. I'll have to try it out but it might not be easy. And we'd be repeating a lot of the setup code that's in ActionForm.jsx if we went this route.
